scripts.brands: npm run copy && node index.js -s brands
scripts.release: npm run release:solid && npm run release:brands
scripts.release:solid: npm run solid && DistributionTool -b -i com.fortawsome.solid.free.sdIconPack -o Release
scripts.release:brands: npm run brands && DistributionTool -b -i com.fortawsome.brands.free.sdIconPack -o Release
